attributes.action: Award a suitable honour to Dr Paul Brand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dr Paul Brand, Junior Dean and Academic Secretary at All Souls College Oxford has undertaken over many years the transcription and translation of the earliest English law reports and in so doing has extended our knowledge of the development of law in England in the medieval period. The work is exceptionally demanding of skills and time in deciphering medieval documents in Latin and their translation. He has completed 3 volumes published by the Selden Society, the academic society devoted to making available manuscript sources of English legal history and whose work is recognised throughout the common law world and beyond.
